text: I wake up at an ungodly hour of the morning each day (3 a.m. or earlier), and these make it easy on me. Sometimes I am too lazy, or just do not want to make a pot for myself, and these fill the void. Taste is good and they do what I want them to do. Wake me up!!  I recommend them. Received them March 5th, 2012. Expires September 30th, 2012.
